item.title: Gail add a quote by Julia Spencer-Fleming
item.description: "He stomped away like a pint-sized Godzilla looking for Tokyo." -- Julia Spencer-Fleming

item.title: Gail add a quote by Julia Spencer-Fleming
item.description: "It never ceases to amaze me how many folks jump right over "I'll try" to "I can't." -- Julia Spencer-Fleming
